content:
The chunk is part of the `addJob` method in the JobManager class. It initializes task processing when the first job is added by registering the `_process` method with the task manager using `taskMgr.add`. Additionally, it updates the tracking of the highest priority among all jobs to ensure tasks are processed correctly. The logging statement confirms the addition of a new job.

**Context:**
The chunk is within the `addJob` method, initializing task processing and updating the highest priority when adding a new job.

taskMgr.add(self._process, JobManager.TaskName)
            self._highestPriority = pri
        elif pri > self._highestPriority:
            self._highestPriority = pri
        self.notify.debug('added job: %s' % job.getJobName())
